title: Steph Curry Having a Historic Finals
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss how the Celtics need to defend Steph Curry AND why Jayson Tatum is struggling in the paint. PLUS, who is the 2nd best Warrior: Klay, Wiggins or Poole? Did Tyreek Hill go too far gassing up his new QB Tua? Anthony Davis hasn’t shot a ball once since April – Jalen takes us behind the curtain on AD’s offseason. The guys give their Game 5 Finals predictions AND declare that Father’s Day needs to get more attention! All that and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
